metaTitle: Villa Odon Jávea - €1.39M | 4 Chambres Luxury Villa | Costa Blanca
metaDescription: Discover Villa Odon: stunning 4-bedroom villa in Jávea's prestigious Monte Olimpo. 1000m² plot, sea views, 8 minutes to beach. Ready to move in. €1,390,000.
